img_above_text:
## How to Find the Skandha of Choice
* **Location: Chapter 4: (The Webbed Hollow, Webbed Hollow, The Purifying Spring).**
img_below_text:
The Skandha of Choice can be found in Chapter 4. Go right from The Purifying Spring Keeper's Choice and up the stairs and through the gap in the wall.
![Five Skandhas \(6\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/d/d4/Five_Skandhas_%286%29.png)

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from Chapter 4 of the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*, specifically in "The Webbed Hollow" near "The Purifying Spring." It shows the player character standing in a dimly lit cavern with ornate armor and a staff, alongside decorative structures. A red arrow highlights the path forward, guiding players to ascend stairs and proceed through a gap in the wall to locate the "Skandha of Choice." This image serves as a visual aid in the walkthrough to help players navigate the area.
